document_data.name: Vandarl
document_data.mainbody: '''Vandarl''' was a thief from [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Vandarl was a thief for hire, who avoided stealing from noblemen.
document_data.Relationships: Vandarl was often mentioned together with [[Skult]]. They worked as a team, nicknamed 'Skull and Van'.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: During the [[Open Feast]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}} in [[Castle Obarskyr]], [[Cormyr]], the topic of Skult and Vandarl was brought up during a reception in which a diplomatic envoy from [[Milvarune]] participated. They were contrasted and compared with the [[Silent Shadow]].
